lines:
2arch 
Soven 
19 19

Nr. Suns Sing Fan

536 Corizonwealth Ave.

Doston, laws.

My dear Espen:

That ke for your good letter. I en delight ad 
to know that you are coming out hero again so soon. I 
have an fragment for Satuday waning, and have promised 
to help or a 101204 In Lovell my preaching for him on 
Sunday coming. I am such that we can 22nd time, however,

to got together for a chest; and if I am here, I should like

mighty wall to have you take dinner

on me on Sunday. Look

me up who you as here anyway.

Faithfully yours,
raw: 2arch  Soven  19 19  Nr. Suns Sing Fan  536 Corizonwealth Ave.  Doston, laws.  My dear Espen:  That ke for your good letter. I en delight ad  to know that you are coming out hero again so soon. I  have an fragment for Satuday waning, and have promised  to help or a 101204 In Lovell my preaching for him on  Sunday coming. I am such that we can 22nd time, however,  to got together for a chest; and if I am here, I should like  mighty wall to have you take dinner  on me on Sunday. Look  me up who you as here anyway.  Faithfully yours,

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter proposing that they meet on Sunday and have dinner after Stearns preaches that morning in Lowell.
